title: Hot For The Boss Complete Edition
description: Alisha Jackson takes crap from no one. Applying for a new job, she meets her new employer and sparks fly. Little does she know that he will affect her life like no other and she's about to experience the hottest sex of her life. When Scott wants more than just sex, Alisha fights against it and is reluctant to give him her heart. An accident brings them back together stronger than every despite a surprise which turns their lives upside down. Their relationship will face a number of challenges but will their obsession with each other be enough to keep them together?This 49,000 word book collects the three Hot For The Boss novellas into one complete edition. It contains explicit sex and bad language.
author: Ariadne Wayne
